com.amplifyframework.rx

Class RxAmplify

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.rx.RxAmplify

  • public final class RxAmplify
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of bindings to facilitate use of the Amplify framework with Rx-centered APIs.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static void configure(android.content.Context context)
                      throws AmplifyException
        Read the configuration from amplifyconfiguration.json file.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context required to read the contents of file
        Throws:
        AmplifyException - thrown when already configured or there is no plugin found for a configuration

      • configure

        public static void configure(AmplifyConfiguration configuration,
                             android.content.Context context)
                      throws AmplifyException
        Configure Amplify with AmplifyConfiguration object.
        Parameters:
        configuration - AmplifyConfiguration object for configuration via code
        context - An Android Context
        Throws:
        AmplifyException - thrown when already configured or there is no configuration found for a plugin

      • addPlugin

        public static <P extends Plugin<?>> void addPlugin(P plugin)
                                            throws AmplifyException
        Register a plugin with Amplify.
        Type Parameters:
        P - any plugin that conforms to the Plugin interface
        Parameters:
        plugin - an implementation of a CATEGORY_TYPE that conforms to the Plugin interface.
        Throws:
        AmplifyException - when a plugin cannot be registered for the category type it belongs to or when when the plugin's category type is not supported by Amplify.

      • removePlugin

        public static <P extends Plugin<?>> void removePlugin(P plugin)
                                               throws AmplifyException
        Removes a plugin form the Amplify framework.
        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of the plugin being removed
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin to remove from the Amplify framework
        Throws:
        AmplifyException - On failure to remove a plugin
